name: Canvas-test
body:
# canvas-test #### 以下demo建议用`chrome`查看
部分在线效果：
[图片3d变形](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Funny-demo/transform/demo2.html)， [百度](http://www.baidu.com), [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Funny-demo/transform)
[图片拉扯变形](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Funny-demo/transform/demo1.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Funny-demo/transform)
[图片三角化(Low Poly)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Funny-demo/lowpoly/index.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Funny-demo/lowpoly/)
[音频可视化(Web Audio API)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Funny-demo/musicPlayer/index.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Funny-demo/musicPlayer/)
[创意时钟(canvas clock)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Funny-demo/coolClock/index.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Funny-demo/coolClock/)
[canvas 3D](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/3D-demo/3Dcubes.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/3D-demo/)
[飞机大战游戏(plan game)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Game-demo/planGame/index.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Game-demo/planGame/)
[粒子效果(particle)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/src/Particle-demo/orangutan/index.html)， [查看代码](https://github.com/whxaxes/canvas-test/tree/gh-pages/src/Particle-demo/orangutan/)
[...](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/menu.html)
[查看更多效果(more)](http://whxaxes.github.io/canvas-test/menu.html)
把demo下载到本地查看效果：
打开`canvas-test`目录，先安装依赖：`npm install`，然后执行app.js文件：`node app.js`
然后访问[http://127.0.0.1:3030/menu.html](http://127.0.0.1:3030/menu.html)即可
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
